verses.roman:
baḍa haile nīlācale gelā prabhura sthāne
aṣṭa-māsa rahila bhikṣā dena kona dine

synonyms: baḍa haile—when he grew to be a young man; nīlācale—at Jagannātha Purī; gelā—went; prabhura—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sthāne—at the place; aṣṭa-māsa—eight months; rahila—stayed; bhikṣā—prasāda; dena—gave; kona dine—some days.
translation: When Raghunātha grew to be a young man, he visited Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu at Jagannātha Purī and stayed there for eight months. Sometimes he offered prasāda to the Lord.
